kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
Rectangular Scorched Bricks composition
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Foundry Controller
Fuel Tank
Scorched Drain
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
Rectangular Seared Bricks composition
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Fuel Tank
Smeltery Controller
Seared Drain
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
